00044 void WiseRoute::initialize(int stage)
00045 {
00046   BaseNetwLayer::initialize(stage);
00047 
00048   if(stage == 1) {
00049 
00050     EV << "Host index=" << findHost()->getIndex() << ", Id="
00051     << findHost()->getId() << endl;
00052 
00053 
00054     EV << "  host IP address=" << myNetwAddr << endl;
00055     EV << "  host macaddress=" << arp->getMacAddr(myNetwAddr) << endl;
00056     macaddress = arp->getMacAddr(myNetwAddr);
00057 
00058     sinkAddress = LAddress::L3Type( par("sinkAddress").longValue() ); // 0
00059     headerLength = par ("headerLength");
00060     rssiThreshold = par("rssiThreshold");
00061     routeFloodsInterval = par("routeFloodsInterval");
00062 
00063     stats = par("stats");
00064     trace = par("trace");
00065     debug = par("debug");
00066     useSimTracer = par("useSimTracer");
00067     floodSeqNumber = 0;
00068 
00069     nbDataPacketsForwarded = 0;
00070     nbDataPacketsReceived = 0;
00071     nbDataPacketsSent = 0;
00072     nbDuplicatedFloodsReceived = 0;
00073     nbFloodsSent = 0;
00074     nbPureUnicastSent = 0;
00075     nbRouteFloodsSent = 0;
00076     nbRouteFloodsReceived = 0;
00077     nbUnicastFloodForwarded = 0;
00078     nbPureUnicastForwarded = 0;
00079     nbGetRouteFailures = 0;
00080     nbRoutesRecorded = 0;
00081     nbHops = 0;
00082     receivedRSSI.setName("receivedRSSI");
00083     routeRSSI.setName("routeRSSI");
00084     allReceivedRSSI.setName("allReceivedRSSI");
00085     receivedBER.setName("receivedBER");
00086     routeBER.setName("routeBER");
00087     allReceivedBER.setName("allReceivedBER");
00088     nextHopSelectionForSink.setName("nextHopSelectionForSink");
00089 
00090     routeFloodTimer = new cMessage("route-flood-timer", SEND_ROUTE_FLOOD_TIMER);
00091     // only schedule a flood of the node is a sink!!
00092     if (routeFloodsInterval > 0 && myNetwAddr==sinkAddress)
00093       scheduleAt(simTime() + uniform(0.5, 1.5), routeFloodTimer);
00094 
00095     if(useSimTracer) {
00096       // Get a handle to the tracer module
00097       tracer = FindModule<SimTracer*>::findGlobalModule(); 
00098       //const char *tracerModulePath = "sim.simTracer";
00099       //cModule *modp = simulation.getModuleByPath(tracerModulePath);
00100       //tracer = check_and_cast<SimTracer *>(modp);
00101       if (!tracer) {
00102       error("No SimTracer module found, please check your ned configuration.");
00103       }
00104       // log node position
00105       ChannelMobilityPtrType ptrMobility = ChannelMobilityAccessType().get();
00106       if (ptrMobility) {
00107         Coord pos = ptrMobility->getCurrentPosition();
00108         tracer->logPosition(myNetwAddr, pos.x, pos.y, pos.z);
00109       }
00110     }
00111   }
00112 }
00113 
00114 WiseRoute::~WiseRoute()
00115 {
00116   cancelAndDelete(routeFloodTimer);
00117 }
00118 
00119 void WiseRoute::handleSelfMsg(cMessage* msg)
00120 {
00121   if (msg->getKind() == SEND_ROUTE_FLOOD_TIMER) {
00122     // Send route flood packet and restart the timer
00123     WiseRoutePkt* pkt = new WiseRoutePkt("route-flood", ROUTE_FLOOD);
00124     pkt->setByteLength(headerLength);
00125     pkt->setInitialSrcAddr(myNetwAddr);
00126     pkt->setFinalDestAddr(LAddress::L3BROADCAST);
00127     pkt->setSrcAddr(myNetwAddr);
00128     pkt->setDestAddr(LAddress::L3BROADCAST);
00129     pkt->setNbHops(0);
00130     floodTable.insert(make_pair(myNetwAddr, floodSeqNumber));
00131     pkt->setSeqNum(floodSeqNumber);
00132     floodSeqNumber++;
00133     pkt->setIsFlood(1);
00134     setDownControlInfo(pkt, LAddress::L2BROADCAST);
00135     sendDown(pkt);
00136     nbFloodsSent++;
00137     nbRouteFloodsSent++;
00138     scheduleAt(simTime() + routeFloodsInterval + uniform(0, 1), routeFloodTimer);
00139   }
00140   else {
00141     EV << "WiseRoute - handleSelfMessage: got unexpected message of kind " << msg->getKind() << endl;
00142     delete msg;
00143   }
00144 }
00145 
00146 
00147 void WiseRoute::handleLowerMsg(cMessage* msg)
00148 {
00149   WiseRoutePkt*           netwMsg        = check_and_cast<WiseRoutePkt*>(msg);
00150   const LAddress::L3Type& finalDestAddr  = netwMsg->getFinalDestAddr();
00151   const LAddress::L3Type& initialSrcAddr = netwMsg->getInitialSrcAddr();
00152   const LAddress::L3Type& srcAddr        = netwMsg->getSrcAddr();
00153   double rssi = static_cast<MacToNetwControlInfo*>(netwMsg->getControlInfo())->getRSSI();
00154   double ber = static_cast<MacToNetwControlInfo*>(netwMsg->getControlInfo())->getBitErrorRate();
00155   // Check whether the message is a flood and if it has to be forwarded.
00156   floodTypes floodType = updateFloodTable(netwMsg->getIsFlood(), initialSrcAddr, finalDestAddr,
00157                         netwMsg->getSeqNum());
00158   if(trace) {
00159     allReceivedRSSI.record(rssi);
00160     allReceivedBER.record(ber);
00161   }
00162   if (floodType == DUPLICATE) {
00163     nbDuplicatedFloodsReceived++;
00164     delete netwMsg;
00165   }
00166   else {
00167     const cObject* pCtrlInfo = NULL;
00168     // If the message is a route flood, update the routing table.
00169     if (netwMsg->getKind() == ROUTE_FLOOD)
00170       updateRouteTable(initialSrcAddr, srcAddr, rssi, ber);
00171 
00172     if (finalDestAddr == myNetwAddr || LAddress::isL3Broadcast(finalDestAddr)) {
00173       WiseRoutePkt* msgCopy;
00174       if (floodType == FORWARD) {
00175         // it's a flood. copy for delivery, forward original.
00176         // if we are here (see updateFloodTable()), finalDestAddr == IP Broadcast. Hence finalDestAddr,
00177         // initialSrcAddr, and destAddr have already been correctly set
00178         // at origin, as well as the MAC control info. Hence only update
00179         // local hop source address.
00180         msgCopy = check_and_cast<WiseRoutePkt*>(netwMsg->dup());
00181         netwMsg->setSrcAddr(myNetwAddr);
00182         pCtrlInfo = netwMsg->removeControlInfo();
00183         setDownControlInfo(netwMsg, LAddress::L2BROADCAST);
00184         netwMsg->setNbHops(netwMsg->getNbHops()+1);
00185         sendDown(netwMsg);
00186         nbDataPacketsForwarded++;
00187       }
00188       else
00189         msgCopy = netwMsg;
00190       if (msgCopy->getKind() == DATA) {
00191         sendUp(decapsMsg(msgCopy));
00192         nbDataPacketsReceived++;
00193       }
00194       else {
00195         nbRouteFloodsReceived++;
00196         delete msgCopy;
00197       }
00198     }
00199     else {
00200       // not for me. if flood, forward as flood. else select a route
00201       if (floodType == FORWARD) {
00202         netwMsg->setSrcAddr(myNetwAddr);
00203         pCtrlInfo = netwMsg->removeControlInfo();
00204         setDownControlInfo(netwMsg, LAddress::L2BROADCAST);
00205         netwMsg->setNbHops(netwMsg->getNbHops()+1);
00206         sendDown(netwMsg);
00207         nbDataPacketsForwarded++;
00208         nbUnicastFloodForwarded++;
00209       }
00210       else {
00211         LAddress::L3Type nextHop = getRoute(finalDestAddr);
00212         if (LAddress::isL3Broadcast(nextHop)) {
00213           // no route exist to destination, attempt to send to final destination
00214           nextHop = finalDestAddr;
00215           nbGetRouteFailures++;
00216         }
00217         netwMsg->setSrcAddr(myNetwAddr);
00218         netwMsg->setDestAddr(nextHop);
00219         pCtrlInfo = netwMsg->removeControlInfo();
00220         setDownControlInfo(netwMsg, arp->getMacAddr(nextHop));
00221         netwMsg->setNbHops(netwMsg->getNbHops()+1);
00222         sendDown(netwMsg);
00223         nbDataPacketsForwarded++;
00224         nbPureUnicastForwarded++;
00225       }
00226     }
00227     if (pCtrlInfo != NULL)
00228       delete pCtrlInfo;
00229   }
00230 }
00231 
00232 void WiseRoute::handleLowerControl(cMessage *msg)
00233 {
00234     delete msg;
00235 }
00236 
00237 void WiseRoute::handleUpperMsg(cMessage* msg)
00238 {
00239   LAddress::L3Type finalDestAddr;
00240   LAddress::L3Type nextHopAddr;
00241   LAddress::L2Type nextHopMacAddr;
00242   WiseRoutePkt*    pkt   = new WiseRoutePkt(msg->getName(), DATA);
00243   cObject*         cInfo = msg->removeControlInfo();
00244 
00245   pkt->setByteLength(headerLength);
00246 
00247   if ( cInfo == NULL ) {
00248       EV << "WiseRoute warning: Application layer did not specifiy a destination L3 address\n"
00249          << "\tusing broadcast address instead\n";
00250       finalDestAddr = LAddress::L3BROADCAST;
00251   }
00252   else {
00253     EV <<"WiseRoute: CInfo removed, netw addr="<< NetwControlInfo::getAddressFromControlInfo( cInfo ) <<endl;
00254     finalDestAddr = NetwControlInfo::getAddressFromControlInfo( cInfo );
00255     delete cInfo;
00256   }
00257 
00258   pkt->setFinalDestAddr(finalDestAddr);
00259   pkt->setInitialSrcAddr(myNetwAddr);
00260   pkt->setSrcAddr(myNetwAddr);
00261   pkt->setNbHops(0);
00262 
00263   if (LAddress::isL3Broadcast(finalDestAddr))
00264     nextHopAddr = LAddress::L3BROADCAST;
00265   else
00266     nextHopAddr = getRoute(finalDestAddr, true);
00267   pkt->setDestAddr(nextHopAddr);
00268   if (LAddress::isL3Broadcast(nextHopAddr)) {
00269     // it's a flood.
00270     nextHopMacAddr = LAddress::L2BROADCAST;
00271     pkt->setIsFlood(1);
00272     nbFloodsSent++;
00273     // record flood in flood table
00274     floodTable.insert(make_pair(myNetwAddr, floodSeqNumber));
00275     pkt->setSeqNum(floodSeqNumber);
00276     floodSeqNumber++;
00277     nbGetRouteFailures++;
00278   }
00279   else {
00280     pkt->setIsFlood(0);
00281     nbPureUnicastSent++;
00282     nextHopMacAddr = arp->getMacAddr(nextHopAddr);
00283   }
00284   setDownControlInfo(pkt, nextHopMacAddr);
00285   assert(static_cast<cPacket*>(msg));
00286   pkt->encapsulate(static_cast<cPacket*>(msg));
00287   sendDown(pkt);
00288   nbDataPacketsSent++;
00289 }
00290 
00291 void WiseRoute::finish()
00292 {
00293   if (stats) {
00294     recordScalar("nbDataPacketsForwarded", nbDataPacketsForwarded);
00295     recordScalar("nbDataPacketsReceived", nbDataPacketsReceived);
00296     recordScalar("nbDataPacketsSent", nbDataPacketsSent);
00297     recordScalar("nbDuplicatedFloodsReceived", nbDuplicatedFloodsReceived);
00298     recordScalar("nbFloodsSent", nbFloodsSent);
00299     recordScalar("nbPureUnicastSent", nbPureUnicastSent);
00300     recordScalar("nbRouteFloodsSent", nbRouteFloodsSent);
00301     recordScalar("nbRouteFloodsReceived", nbRouteFloodsReceived);
00302     recordScalar("nbUnicastFloodForwarded", nbUnicastFloodForwarded);
00303     recordScalar("nbPureUnicastForwarded", nbPureUnicastForwarded);
00304     recordScalar("nbGetRouteFailures", nbGetRouteFailures);
00305     recordScalar("nbRoutesRecorded", nbRoutesRecorded);
00306     recordScalar("meanNbHops", (double) nbHops / (double) nbDataPacketsReceived);
00307   }
00308 }
00309 
00310 void WiseRoute::updateRouteTable(const LAddress::L3Type& origin, const LAddress::L3Type& lastHop, double rssi, double ber)
00311 {
00312   tRouteTable::iterator pos;
00313 
00314   pos = routeTable.find(origin);
00315   if(trace) {
00316     receivedRSSI.record(rssi);
00317     receivedBER.record(ber);
00318   }
00319   if (pos == routeTable.end()) {
00320     // A route towards origin does not exist yet. Insert the currently discovered one
00321     // only if the received RSSI is above the threshold.
00322     if (rssi > rssiThreshold) {
00323       tRouteTableEntry newEntry;
00324 
00325       // last hop from origin means next hop towards origin.
00326       newEntry.nextHop = lastHop;
00327       newEntry.rssi = rssi;
00328       if(trace) {
00329         routeRSSI.record(rssi);
00330         routeBER.record(ber);
00331       }
00332       routeTable.insert(make_pair(origin, newEntry));
00333       if(useSimTracer) {
00334         tracer->logLink(myNetwAddr, lastHop);
00335       }
00336       nbRoutesRecorded++;
00337       if (origin == LAddress::L3NULL && trace) {
00338         nextHopSelectionForSink.record(static_cast<double>(lastHop));
00339       }
00340     }
00341   }
00342   else {
00343     // A route towards the node which originated the received packet already exists.
00344     // Replace its entry only if the route proposal that we just received has a stronger
00345     // RSSI.
00346 //    tRouteTableEntry entry = pos->second;
00347 //    if (entry.rssi > rssiThreshold) {
00348 //      entry.nextHop = lastHop;
00349 //      entry.rssi = rssi;
00350 //      if (origin == 0)
00351 //        nextHopSelectionForSink.record(lastHop);
00352 //    }
00353   }
00354 }
00355 
00356 cMessage* WiseRoute::decapsMsg(WiseRoutePkt *msg)
00357 {
00358   cMessage *m = msg->decapsulate();
00359   setUpControlInfo(m, msg->getSrcAddr());
00360   nbHops = nbHops + msg->getNbHops();
00361   // delete the netw packet
00362   delete msg;
00363   return m;
00364 }
00365 
00366 WiseRoute::floodTypes WiseRoute::updateFloodTable(bool isFlood, const tFloodTable::key_type& srcAddr, const tFloodTable::key_type& destAddr, unsigned long seqNum)
00367 {
00368   if (isFlood) {
00369     tFloodTable::iterator pos = floodTable.lower_bound(srcAddr);
00370     tFloodTable::iterator posEnd = floodTable.upper_bound(srcAddr);
00371 
00372     while (pos != posEnd) {
00373       if (seqNum == pos->second)
00374         return DUPLICATE;  // this flood is known, don't forward it.
00375       ++pos;
00376     }
00377     floodTable.insert(make_pair(srcAddr, seqNum));
00378     if (destAddr == myNetwAddr)
00379       return FORME;
00380     else
00381       return FORWARD;
00382   }
00383   else
00384     return NOTAFLOOD;
00385 }
00386 
00387 WiseRoute::tFloodTable::key_type WiseRoute::getRoute(const tFloodTable::key_type& destAddr, bool /*iAmOrigin*/) const
00388 {
00389   // Find a route to dest address. As in the embedded code, if no route exists, indicate
00390   // final destination as next hop. If we'are lucky, final destination is one hop away...
00391   // If I am the origin of the packet and no route exists, use flood, hence return broadcast
00392   // address for next hop.
00393   tRouteTable::const_iterator pos = routeTable.find(destAddr);
00394   if (pos != routeTable.end())
00395     return pos->second.nextHop;
00396   else
00397     return LAddress::L3BROADCAST;
00398 }
